txt.en: Símbi wants to know who has sent the half-orcs to Filgogân, where their presence threatens the expedition of dwarves that has come to Hollin.

'Someone sent these half-orcs to Hollin, [placeholder]; it is clear to me that Graug, the chieftain who ordered the camp established inside Filgogân, has his own master. I want to know who this might be.\n\n'I will reward you handsomely for evidence of this overseer. Enter the cave and do battle with the half-orcs, and bring me whatever common thread binds these half-orcs in loyalty to Graug's mysterious master.'

Half-orcs inside the cave of Filgogân, south-west of Bósi's camp and across the dried-up Sirannon, surely carry some proof of their loyalty to Graug's master.\n\nSímbi has asked you to ascertain the common thread that binds these half-orcs together, and bring evidence of it to him.

'You say the half-orcs carried these stones, each of them painted with this hand symbol? This is not Graug's mark; it must certainly be the emblem of his master.

'I do not recognize it. I will show this mark to Bósi when I return to the camp; perhaps he will understand its significance.

'Thank you for your help, [placeholder], and take these coins with my thanks.'

Símbi is outside the entrance to the cave Filgogân, south-west of Bósi's camp, across the dried-up Sirannon.\n\nYou have recovered stones, crudely painted with the emblem of a hand, from many of the half-orcs within Filgogân, and should bring them now to Símbi.
'Perhaps the half-orcs carry some sign of their loyalty to Graug's mysterious master. You should enter the cave and bring me proof of this common thread.'
'You have yet to find sufficient evidence of whoever oversees these half-orcs, [placeholder]. Go back inside and stop wasting time, unless you are not hardy enough for this task!'
'Graug may lead these half-orcs, but he reports to another master.'
'We must keep the half-orcs from leaving Filgogân and threatening the expedition.'
Can only be completed before the Expedition enters Moria.
